title: vs event
body: Why is the vs event pay to play? That's literally the grossest thing you've ever done and i mained adc through the assassin update...

replies.body:
Its not pay to play? You get 2 quests a day that can get you 20-30 tokens daily, i've completed every quest since the event started and i have over 200 tokens now, i havent even spent a cent. Plus there isnt really much you'd be missing out on if you dont buy it, literally just a  ward and a bunch of Yasuo/Riven main quests. I reckon this event is really good and i love seeing how much chaos is wrecking order!
                                                                                  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
